Source file src/github.com/bnb-chain/greenfield-go-sdk/examples/storage.go

Documentation: github.com/bnb-chain/greenfield-go-sdk/examples 

     1  package main
     2  
     3  import (
     4  	"bytes"
     5  	"context"
     6  	"errors"
     7  	"fmt"
     8  	"io"
     9  	"log"
    10  	"time"
    11  
    12  	"github.com/bnb-chain/greenfield-go-sdk/client"
    13  	"github.com/bnb-chain/greenfield-go-sdk/types"
    14  )
    15  
    16  // it is the example of basic storage SDKs usage
    17  func main() {
    18  	account, err := types.NewAccountFromPrivateKey("test", privateKey)
    19  	if err != nil {
    20  		log.Fatalf("New account from private key error, %v", err)
    21  	}
    22  	cli, err := client.New(chainId, rpcAddr, client.Option{DefaultAccount: account})
    23  	if err != nil {
    24  		log.Fatalf("unable to new greenfield client, %v", err)
    25  	}
    26  	ctx := context.Background()
    27  
    28  	// get storage providers list
    29  	spLists, err := cli.ListStorageProviders(ctx, true)
    30  	if err != nil {
    31  		log.Fatalf("fail to list in service sps")
    32  	}
    33  	// choose the first sp to be the primary SP
    34  	primarySP := spLists[0].GetOperatorAddress()
    35  
    36  	// create bucket
    37  	_, err = cli.CreateBucket(ctx, bucketName, primarySP, types.CreateBucketOptions{})
    38  	handleErr(err, "CreateBucket")
    39  	log.Printf("create bucket %s on SP: %s successfully \n", bucketName, spLists[0].Endpoint)
    40  
    41  	// head bucket
    42  	bucketInfo, err := cli.HeadBucket(ctx, bucketName)
    43  	handleErr(err, "HeadBucket")
    44  	log.Println("bucket info:", bucketInfo.String())
    45  
    46  	// Create object content
    47  	var buffer bytes.Buffer
    48  	line := `0123456789`
    49  	for i := 0; i < objectSize/10; i++ {
    50  		buffer.WriteString(fmt.Sprintf("%s", line))
    51  	}
    52  
    53  	// create and put object
    54  	txnHash, err := cli.CreateObject(ctx, bucketName, objectName, bytes.NewReader(buffer.Bytes()), types.CreateObjectOptions{})
    55  	handleErr(err, "CreateObject")
    56  
    57  	err = cli.PutObject(ctx, bucketName, objectName, int64(buffer.Len()),
    58  		bytes.NewReader(buffer.Bytes()), types.PutObjectOptions{TxnHash: txnHash})
    59  	handleErr(err, "PutObject")
    60  
    61  	log.Printf("object: %s has been uploaded to SP\n", objectName)
    62  
    63  	waitObjectSeal(cli, bucketName, objectName)
    64  
    65  	// get object
    66  	reader, info, err := cli.GetObject(ctx, bucketName, objectName, types.GetObjectOptions{})
    67  	handleErr(err, "GetObject")
    68  	log.Printf("get object %s successfully, size %d \n", info.ObjectName, info.Size)
    69  	handleErr(err, "GetObject")
    70  	objectBytes, err := io.ReadAll(reader)
    71  	if !bytes.Equal(objectBytes, buffer.Bytes()) {
    72  		handleErr(errors.New("download content not same"), "GetObject")
    73  	}
    74  
    75  	// list object
    76  	objects, err := cli.ListObjects(ctx, bucketName, types.ListObjectsOptions{true, "", "", "/", "", 10})
    77  	log.Println("list objects result:")
    78  	for _, obj := range objects.Objects {
    79  		i := obj.ObjectInfo
    80  		log.Printf("object: %s, status: %s\n", i.ObjectName, i.ObjectStatus)
    81  	}
    82  
    83  	// list object by object ids
    84  	ids := []uint64{1, 2, 333}
    85  	objects2, err := cli.ListObjectsByObjectID(ctx, ids)
    86  	log.Printf("list objects by ids result: %v\n", objects2)
    87  	for _, object := range objects2.Objects {
    88  		if object != nil {
    89  			log.Printf("object: %s, status: %s\n", object.ObjectInfo.ObjectName, object.ObjectInfo.ObjectStatus)
    90  		}
    91  	}
    92  
    93  	// list buckets by bucket ids
    94  	buckets, err := cli.ListBucketsByBucketID(ctx, ids)
    95  	log.Printf("list buckets by ids result: %v\n", buckets)
    96  	for _, bucket := range buckets.Buckets {
    97  		if bucket != nil {
    98  			log.Printf("bucket: %s, status: %s\n", bucket.BucketInfo.BucketName, bucket.BucketInfo.BucketStatus)
    99  		}
   100  	}
   101  }
   102  
   103  func waitObjectSeal(cli client.Client, bucketName, objectName string) {
   104  	ctx := context.Background()
   105  	// wait for the object to be sealed
   106  	timeout := time.After(15 * time.Second)
   107  	ticker := time.NewTicker(2 * time.Second)
   108  
   109  	for {
   110  		select {
   111  		case <-timeout:
   112  			err := errors.New("object not sealed after 15 seconds")
   113  			handleErr(err, "HeadObject")
   114  		case <-ticker.C:
   115  			objectInfo, err := cli.HeadObject(ctx, bucketName, objectName)
   116  			handleErr(err, "HeadObject")
   117  			if objectInfo.GetObjectStatus().String() == "OBJECT_STATUS_SEALED" {
   118  				ticker.Stop()
   119  				fmt.Printf("put object %s successfully \n", objectName)
   120  				return
   121  			}
   122  		}
   123  	}
   124  }
   125  

Build version go1.19.10.
